roleset.name: cause to lose magnetic properties
roleset.note: DEMAGNETIZE-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from demagnetize.01-v)

role.descr: causer of loss of magnetism, agent

example.name: passive
example.text: We have observed that [Nickel thin films] may be partially demagnetized *-1 on time scales shorter than 300 fs.
example.arg: on time scales shorter than 300 fs
